page.title: 11CROSSGATES AREA THE FUTURE 2
page.content: As for Halbeath, we think it will eventually join completely to Dunfermline and then become just a part of Dunfermline not, a separate village. To a large extent those who live in Crossgates and Halbeath do not work there. Many commute to Dunfermline or Rosyth Dockyard. The future of Rosyth Dockyard is a bit uncertain at the moment, with the present Government's policy of privatising state owned industries. This must reflect on the area. At this time there is very few new houses in the area but due to the land around these villages, we suppose new houses will be built on this land. For all these things, and others not considered, time will only tell.
